Properties.delegate: delegate - template object, filled with model row
Properties.contentX: x offset to visible part of the content surface
Properties.contentY: y offset to visible part of the content surface
Properties.contentFollowsCurrentItem: auto-scroll content to current focused item

Methods.itemAt: returns index of item by x,y coordinates
Methods._createDelegate: @internal creates delegate in given item slot
Methods._discardDelegate: @internal creates delegate in given item slot
